|brand = SiPEED |model = Lichee RV |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Dock |revision = Pro |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;D1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = RISC-V |cpu1_type_rev = XuanTie C906 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |cpu2chip1 = Bouffalo;BL702; |cpu2_cores = 1 |cpu2_type = RISC-V |cpu2spd = 144 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835FZNI; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Bouffalo;BL702;onchip; |flash2size = 192 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K512M16VRP-107 IT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 132 KiB |ram2chip = Bouffalo;BL702;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 74:EE:2A

|serial = yes,, USB Female (Type-C) |jtag = yes,, USB Female (Type-C)
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0 LE, HDMI, MIPI DSI, RGB LCD FPC, Microphone, Audio out (JST 2.0), SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = 3W Mono Class D Audio Amplifier;Nsiway;NS4150;;1;,,, Intelligent Control LED Integrated Light Source;World Semi;WS2812C;;1;,,, 1MHz, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TOLL Micro;TMI3411;;3;,,, 1.5MHz, 1.5A, 5.5V Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;RyChip Semi;RY3415;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = sipeed |defaultpass = licheepi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2022 |estprice = 30 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core XuanTie C906 ([https://occ.t-head.cn/vendor/cpu/index?id=3817197695983423488 RISC-V]) *MCU: Bouffalo BL702 @144MHz :32-bit RISC-V Core with FPU (used for JTAG+UART debugger) *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR Flash, TF card (max.1TB)/MMC card *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *WLAN: 802.11b/g/n (1T1R) Wi-Fi *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 1x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/06/21/sipeed-lichee-rv-dock-pro-risc-v-sbc-adds-mipi-rgb-lcd-connector-dual-mic-and-bl702-jtaguart-debugger/ ''SSipeed Lichee RV Dock Pro RISC-V SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://hackaday.com/2022/01/06/new-part-day-the-risc-v-lichee-rv-module-and-dock/ ''New Part Day: The RISC-V Lichee-RV Module And Dock'' on '''Hackaday'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2021/12/this-5-dock-turns-the-17-sipeed-lichee-rv-into-a-fully-functional-risc-v-computer.html ''This $5 dock turns the $17 Sipeed Lichee RV'' on '''LiliPuting'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Sipeed_Lichee_RV#Lichee_RV_Dock_Pro ''Lichee RV Dock Pro'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki]
